entry.title: Ss for Fun
entry.content:
Introduction

Kahoot! can evaluate students’ understanding, reinforce crucial concepts, and help them retain information, hence it is a tool that encourages and activates their learning. It also allows instructors to offer more opportunities for class discussion and student-to-student contact.

Procedure

  1. Get on Kahoot.
  2. Enter pin code.
  3. Enter ur English name.
  4. Look at Tr. Kiki’s screen (Questions).
  5. Back to your screen and choose answers.

Conclusion

Game formats are a great approach to get students excited about learning. It can also be used by instructors to stimulate more class discussion and student-to-student interaction.
